name: Not Today: Extinction
description:
Not Today (Extinction) is a platform shooter game. Choose your dinosaur and use all your ammo to destroy the meteors that threaten its existence.

Score higher and be the savior of the species.

Controls
- Menus
"A" - select
"D" - Navigate the menu

-GamePlay
"A" and "D" - Jogging

Team:

Luis Antônio: Game Design, Soundtrack and Art.

Moizés Augusto: Game Design and Programming.

Creative Commons

Character Art: https://arks.itch.io/

Background Trees: https://ansimuz.itch.io/

Random Weapons: https://wubs.itch.io/
